DataElement.preferredName: Disease Diagnosis Date To Death Date Day Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The number of days from the date the patient was diagnosed to the date of the patient's death.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disease Diagnosis Date To Death Date
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation._a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen._Used as a function word to indicate direction, purpose, or movement._The absence of life or state of being dead._a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Event; something that happens at a given place and time._The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day._To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.
